meanings.sent1: The rainproof jacket kept me dry during the storm.
meanings.sent2: I bought a rainproof tent for our camping trip.
meanings.sent3: The rainproof umbrella saved the day when unexpected showers arrived.
meanings.sent4: Her rainproof makeup stayed flawless even in the downpour.
meanings.sent5: The rainproof material of the backpack repelled water like magic.

meanings.sent1: The rainproof windows prevented any leaks in the house.
meanings.sent2: We wore rainproof boots to avoid getting wet in the puddles.
meanings.sent3: The rainproof hat made him look like a stylish detective on a rainy day.
meanings.sent4: The rainproof roof shielded the house from the heavy rain like a protective shield.
meanings.sent5: The rainproof fabric of the curtains blocked out the storm outside completely.

meanings.definition: To make something resistant to rain.
meanings.sent1: She rainproofed her shoes by applying a special spray.
meanings.sent2: The workers rainproofed the building before the rainy season.
meanings.sent3: He tried to rainproof his phone by wrapping it in plastic, but it didn't work well.
meanings.sent4: The gardener rainproofed the plants by covering them with plastic sheets.
meanings.sent5: They decided to rainproof the picnic area with a large canopy to avoid any disruptions from the weather.
